related_questions.question: Kk tolong di jawab sekarang ya mks​

Read the following text to answer questions number 15 to 17. Last month, I sent to Surabaya with my friends for vacation. We went there on a night bus. When we arrived in Lamongan, the bus stopped at a small restaurant for a rest. I got off the bus to get a cup of ginger tea, and my friend drank some cold lemonade. Then I went to the toilet. It tool only a few minutes. When I came out again, the bus was not there, it had gone! My friends were not there too. Feeling shocked and confused. I asked a waiter About the bus. She said the bus departed about five minutes ago. I tried to call my friend on my phone, but the battery as running low. I could not do anything but hope and pray. After several minutes, my wish came true. The bus came back! I got on the bus and walked to my seat. I was so ashamed when everybody on the bus looked at me. I could feel my face turn red. 15. What is the best title of the text above? *     A. My vacation.
B. Vacation with my family.
C. Vacation to Surabaya.
D. Vacation to foreign Country.
Last month I went to Surabaya with my friends for vacation..." This part belongs to . . . . *
A. Orientation
B. Series of events
C. Reorientation
D. Setting of time and place
The bus was not there it had gone!" The word "it" in the second paragraph refers to . . . *
A. The writer
B. The bus
C. The waiter
The cold lemonade
​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

1. A. my vacation

2. D. Setting of time and place

3. B. The bus

Penjelasan:

semoga membantu :)

related_questions.question:
Make sentences with the words given    1. Seimpi -dance-traditional
 2.Mr.Handoko -teacher-kind
 3. Miss kirana -dancer-famous
 4. Jakarta-city-big
 5. I-boy-strong
 6.Farida-girl-slim
 7. We-stundent-Indonesia
 8. Borobudur-temple-famous
 9. Indonesia-country-big
 10. Wisnu-handsome-boy

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

1. Serimpi is one of the traditional dance from Yogyakarta.

2. Mr. Handoko is a kind teacher.

3. Mrs. Kirana is a famous dancer.

4. Jakarta is a big city.

5. I am a strong boy.

6. Farida is a slim girl.

7. We are Indonesian students / We are students from Indonesia

8. Borobudur is a famous temple.

9. Indonesia is a big country.

10. Wisnu is a handsome boy.

Penjelasan:

hope you find this helpful^•^

. My
mother (18) her tea My Daddy ... (19) hot chocolate into his cup.

 b. are gathering
 c. gather
 d. gathered

16. a. read
 b. reading
 c. is reading
 d. am reading

17. a. play
 b. plays
 c. played
 d. is playing

18. a. enjoy
 b. enjoys
 c. is enjoing
 d. am enjoying

19. a. am pouring
 b. is pouring
 c. are pouring
 d. poured

15. B. Are Gathering

16. D. Am Reading ( di soal tidak ada penjelasan siapa )

17. D. Is Playing

18. C. Is Enjoying

19. B. Is Pouring
